description.en:
The protagonist is a guy who is among the stupidest of the stupidest in the school. In this school your grades can, under the supervision of teachers, take a virtual form to do battle! However, if you leave an examination midway, you get zero marks. A bright and cute girl, Mizuki Himeji, had a high fever during her examination. Despite her potential to be the second highest scorer in the level, she obtained zero marks for having left due to her illness and is thus banished to the worst class, Class F.  
  
Grades mean nearly everything. For Class A: They have a smart-looking teacher, a plasma TV as big as the entire wall as their blackboard, personal laptops, personal air-conditioners, refrigerators, adjustable seats and all kinds of different appliances. Within the refrigerator, there are all kinds of drinks and snacks. Their ceiling is made of glass, the wall lets them put up high-class drawings and plants.  
  
As for Class F (the worst class): They have Japanese desks and seat paddings. Their blackboard is dirty and there's even no chalk! Someone complains the legs of his desk are broken, so the teacher asks, "Didn't we distribute some glue to stick wood together? Glue it back yourself later." Another one complains the wind is blowing in from the broken window. The teacher says, "I got it. I'll apply for plastic bags and super-glue to fix it later." There are spider webs everywhere, not a patch of the wall is clean. A unique moldy smell spreads across the entire room; it must be from the old tatamis used to tile the floor. Welcome to Class F.  
  
The protagonist feels displeased at such an arrangement; he seeks help from his friends to try to make a change through invoking war! And they devise all kinds of plans to try to beat the famous Class A, scheming to get Class A's classroom and equipment if they win!!  
  
Adaptation of the light novel series written by Inoue Kenji with illustrations by Haga Yui  


---

description.ru: 17-летний Акихиса Ёши, парень простой до неприличия, которого окружающие за глаза кличут «дурачком», учится в академии Фумидзуки, где принцип «каждому по уму» доведен до логического завершения. Все решают результаты тестов, в итоге гении и зубрилки из класса «А» наслаждаются чудесами комфорта и техники, а лодыри и лоботрясы из класса «F» сидят в кабинете с разбитыми окнами и оборудованием довоенной сельской школы. Самое интересное, что в Фумидзуки «школьные войны» допускаются и даже поощряются, ведь их ведут не сами ученики, а призванные ими миниатюрные аватары, сила которых измеряется опять же итогами тестов хозяина. Драться могут все, победитель уходит наверх, побежденный скатывается вниз по иерархической лестнице.

description.en:
Vilified by others as a "witch", Evris, the youngest daughter of the House of Bradley, is engaged to Mark, the fifth prince of the Kingdom of Klengel. When he abruptly announces that their engagement is broken off, Evris is plunged into despair. However, someone reaches out to her instead... The cross-dressing crown prince (♀) of a neighboring country!?

This is the story of a red-haired witch who manipulates shadows and a cross-dressing crown prince (♀) who is serving as a body double for her missing older brother. 

The curtain rises on a fantasy romantic comedy of a girl being teased by a princess!

Serialization began in the July 2023 issue of *Yuri Hime*.
description.ja:
「魔女」と罵られるブラッドリー家の末娘・イヴリスは、婚約相手であるクレンゲル王国第5王子・マルクに突然の婚約破棄を宣言されていた。絶望のどん底に落とされるイヴリス。しかし、そんな彼女に手を差し伸べるのは…隣国の男装皇太子!?
影を操る赤髪の魔女令嬢と失踪した兄の影武者となる男装皇子。
王子様系女子に翻弄されるファンタジーラブコメ開幕！
description.ru:
Эйвери, младшая дочь дома Брэдли, проклинаемая окружающими как "ведьма", помолвлена с Марком, пятым принцем королевства Кленгель. Когда он неожиданно объявляет, что их помолвка расторгнута, Эйвери впадает в отчаяние. Однако кто-то протягивает ей руку помощи... Наследный принц (♀) соседней страны?!

Это история о ведьме, управляющей тенями, и о переодетом наследном принце (♀), который является двойником пропавшего старшего брата.

Занавес приподнимается над фэнтезийной романтической комедией о девушке, которую дразнит принцесса!
description.tr:
Bu, gölgeleri manipüle eden kızıl saçlı bir cadı ile kayıp ağabeyinin dublörü olarak rol yapan melez veliaht prensin hikâyesidir.

Diğerleri tarafından “cadı” olarak lanetlenen Bradley Hanesi’nin en küçük kızı Evris, Klengel Krallığı’nın beşinci prensi Mark ile nişanlıdır. Mark aniden nişanı bozduğunu açıklayınca Evris umutsuzluğa kapılır. Ancak biri ona yardım elini uzatacaktır… Komşu ülkelerden birinin karşı cinsin kıyafetlerini giymeyi seven veliaht prensi!? Bir prenses tarafından dalga geçilen bir kızın fantastik romantik komedisinde perde açılıyor!

description.en: Yuzu is Hayami Madoka's ardent fan. Having no friends or family that care for her, Madoka is her only solace. Being that Sachiko is Madoka's best friend, she is Yuzu's most hated existence. To vent, she opens a secret account where she posts malicious comments about Sachiko. When she discovers this, she instead attempts to befriend Yuzu and offers her a chance to talk to Madoka. However, an accident occurs and they end up switching bodies with Sachiko being left in coma.
description.vi: Yuzu là một fan hâm mộ cuồng nhiệt của Hayami Madoka. Cô không có người bạn nào hay gia đình quan tâm tới cô cả, Madoka là niềm an ủi duy nhất của cô ấy. Sachiko là bạn thân của Madoka, cô cũng là người mà Yuzu ghét nhất. Để trút giận, Yuzu đã mở một tài khoản riêng tư nơi mà cô đăng những lời ác ý về Sachiko. Khi Sachiko phát hiện ra, cô đã thử kết bạn với Yuzu và đề nghị sẽ cho cô ấy cơ hội nói chuyện với Madoka. Tuy nhiên, một tai nạn đã xảy ra và họ hoán đổi cơ thể cho nhau, trong khi đó Sachiko bị rơi vào hôn mê.

description.en: Suzuki Souta, a high school boy on the school volleyball team, is interested in his classmate Shinonome Asahi, a member of the girls' volleyball team. She thought of him as a good volleyball player, so she has been seeking him out every day. Souta was a keen volleyball player until junior high. However, because of his height, he could never become the spiker he longed to be. As a result, he got into the habit of giving up on things. Souta's high school life: Will he meekly accept what he cannot have? Or will he try to become a man who can stand with Asahi? Youth is a series of choices. Please, Souta, hang in there and do your best!
description.vi: Suzuki Souta là một nam sinh cao trung trong đội bóng chuyền của trường đem lòng thích bạn cùng lớp Shinonome Asahi và cũng là một thành viên của đội bóng chuyền nữ. Hàng ngày Asahi tìm đến Souta vì cậu là một cầu thủ bóng chuyền giỏi. Thế nhưng hhi ở sơ trung, vì chiều cao của mình, ước mơ trở thành vận động viên đánh bóng không thể thành hiện thực như cậu đã kỳ vọng. Vì vậy mà cậu có thói quen từ bỏ mọi thứ. Cuộc sống trung học của Souta: Liệu cậu có đành lòng chấp nhận những gì vượt quá tầm với không? Hay cậu sẽ cố gắng trở thành một người có thể sát cánh cùng Asahi đây? Tuổi trẻ là một chuỗi những lựa chọn. Xin cậu, Souta, cố gắng lên nhé!

title.en: Nou Aru Ogre ga Tsuno o Kakusu

altTitles.ja: 能あるオーガは角を隠す

altTitles.ja-ro: Nou Aru Ogre ga Tsuno wo Kakusu

altTitles.en: A Talented Ogre Hides Its Horn

description.en:
A hero who dies in a fight with the Demon King is cursed on the verge of death. The curse was to reincarnate the hero as Rama, the daughter of a half-ogre and a half-human. 

Sixteen years have passed since then. Rama, who was reincarnated in an ogre village, was tormented by discrimination and prejudice because of her origin, but she had grown beyond the confines of the ogre village, making use of her experience as a former hero. The village chief, who has taken notice of her, gives her an order. The order was to select Rama as the new “Demon King Candidate” from the Ogre village.

A genuine otherworldly fantasy about a former hero torn between “humans” and “ogres”. The story begins!
description.ja:
魔王と相討つ形で死んだ勇者の男は、死の淵で魔王にある”呪い”をかけられる。その”呪い”とは勇者をオーガと人間の混血。ハーフオーガの娘「ラーマ」として輪廻転生させるものだった。
―その後16年の月日が経った。オーガの村に転生したラーマは、その出自故の差別や偏見に苛まれながらも、元勇者としての経験を生かしてオーガの村に収まらないほど成長していた。そんな彼に目を付けた村長よりある命令が下される。その命令とは、ラーマを新たな「魔王候補」としてオーガの村から選抜する、というものであった……。
”人”と”オーガ”との間で揺れ動く元勇者を描く、本格異世界ファンタジー。開幕！

altTitles.ja: ものの歩

description.en:
Awkward Takara Shinobu has always been rejected for being incompetent, a “dunce”. No matter how hard he tries – with studies or with people – he always fails. And now he’s stuck going to a back-up high school far from home.  
  
Due to a miscommunication, he winds up living in a share-house dedicated to training shougi pros. Introduced to the world of shougi, Shinobu has finally made a connection with people who understand and accept him. However…now he wants to go pro too!?  
  
As a part of the JUMP START initiative, the first three chapters of Mononofu were published in English in VIZ Media's digital Weekly Shonen Jump.

altTitles.zh: 凯蒂小姐和她的保镖们

altTitles.zh-hk: 凱蒂小姐和她的保鏢們

altTitles.ja: 黒の召喚士
The Berserker Rises to Greatness.

description.en:
"If you truly want to get stronger, you have to challenge and defeat those stronger than yourself."

While being transmigrated to another world, Kelvin bartered away his memories for a collection of powerful new abilities. Setting out on the ultimate adventure as the world’s strongest Summoner — with his first Follower being the very goddess who brought him over! — he soon discovers his true nature as a battle junkie. Someone wants to pick a fight? Sure, bring it on!

Facing off against one formidable foe after another, Kelvin can hardly contain his delight as he revels in the absolute exhilaration of a good fight! The curtain rises on the start of an epic saga as this black-clad warrior and his allies carve their way into the annals of history! 
___
**Character Designer:** [Kurogin (DIGS)](https://mangadex.org/author/ad469135-32c7-4fcc-b490-d0ebc07eea16)

**Additional Links:**  
- [Official Raw Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1222ci/)
- [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/black-summoner)
description.ru: Он очнулся в мире ничего не помня о себе, даже имени. Зато это мир меча и магии, а он призыватель. Ну, вперед, осваиваться в новом мире!
description.pt-br: As cortinas dessa história se abrem quando nosso protagonista troca suas memórias por um poder imensurável em um novo mundo. Agora, com o nome de Kelvin, ele precisa evoluir, dominar novos subordinados e se tornar o maior invocador de todos os tempos. Mas e então, até onde essa jornada vai nos levar?

altTitles.ja: 踊り場にスカートが鳴る

altTitles.en: The Skirt Sings at the Landing
The Skirt Rings at the Landing

description.en:
Haruma Kiki always dreamed of doing ballroom dance as the feminine "follower" role, but as she aged she only grew taller and taller, eventually causing her to give up ever looking good in a dress or anything ladylike. Now, as a second year in high school, she specializes in the masculine "leader" role—until one day, her partner suddenly leaves her. When Toribami Michiru, a short and pretty first year, shows up wanting to join the ballroom dance club, Kiki asks her to be her new partner, but Michiru reveals that she only plays the leader role—and she wants none other than Kiki as her partner.  
  
Bimonthly serialisation in Yuri Hime.
description.es-la: Haruma Kiki siempre soñó con hacer bailes de salón como el papel de "seguidora" femenina, pero a medida que pasaban los años solo crecía más y más alta, lo que finalmente hizo que renunciara a verse bien con un vestido o cualquier cosa de dama. Ahora, en su segundo año de secundaria, se especializa en el papel de "líder" masculina, hasta que un día, su pareja la abandona de repente. Cuando Toribami Michiru, una pequeña y linda chica de primer año, aparece queriendo unirse al club de baile de salón, Kiki le pide que sea su nueva compañera, pero Michiru revela que ella solo juega el papel de líder, y ella no quiere nada menos que a Kiki como su compañera.

altTitles.ja: この世界は不完全すぎる

description.en: Haga is one of the debuggers that gets stuck in the world of an incomplete VR game. Though he eradicates a monster from a village, the destruction event that ends with the villagers' deaths triggers without fail. However, Nicola, the villager girl he saves, revives before his eyes.
description.ja: 極秘に組織された調査隊「王の探索者」（キングス・シーカー）の一員である主人公・ハガ。この世のあらゆる事象を調べ、王命を受け旅をする探索者は村人からも尊敬されていた。任務の一環でドラゴンの襲撃から村を守ることに成功するハガ。成り行きで助けた少女・ニコラと世界を探検することになるが、ハガの真の目的は冒険ではなく…。
description.pt-br: O protagonista Haga é um membro da equipe de investigação secreta chamada "Os Buscadores do Rei" (Kings Seekers). Os exploradores, que investigam todos os fenômenos deste mundo e viajam sob ordens do rei, são respeitados pelos habitantes das aldeias. Haga consegue proteger uma vila do ataque de um dragão como parte de uma missão. Por acaso, ele acaba ajudando uma garota chamada Nicola e começa a explorar o mundo com ela. No entanto, o verdadeiro objetivo de Haga não é a aventura…

title.en: Yuukyuu no Gusha Asley no, Kenja no Susume: to, Pochi no Daibouken

altTitles.ja: 悠久の愚者アズリーの、賢者のすゝめ　と、ポチの大冒険

altTitles.en: The Eternal Fool's Words of Wisdom: A Pawsitively Fantastic Adventure
The Principle of a Philosopher by Eternal Fool "Asley"

altTitles.pt-br: O Princípio de um Filósofo por um eterno idiota "Asley".

description.en:
A couple thousand years of solitude would wear down any young man—that is, anyone except Asley, an eternally youthful and eternally foolish sorcerer. After all, he has man's best friend...er, familiar, to keep him company. When his Level 100 canine companion Pochi demands that he get some fresh air for the first time in two centuries, Asley sets out to reintegrate into society and test his magic mettle. His mission? Dropping several unglamorous titles from his repertoire and restoring his good (okay, decent) name.

A brand-new world and fresh adventures await Asley after his many years of hermitage. Perhaps he'll lend Pochi a hand to place first in the mysterious Familiar Feud. Or maybe he'll lose all vestiges of dignity and turn tail. Whichever comes first! No matter what, Asley has great evil to fight, a big world to save, and even a little growing up to do...that is, if he can endure Pochi's “friendly advice” along the way!

(Source: J-Novel Club)
description.ja: 魔法大学を落第した落ちこぼれの青年アズリー。偶然精製してしまった「悠久の雫」を飲んでしまい、不老の身体を手に入れてしまう。俗世から離れ、ひきこもって魔法・魔術の研究をしていると、いつのまにか5000年も過ぎていて、気が付けば古代魔法の偉人になっていた…!
description.ru:
В молодости Азли потерпел неудачу в Волшебной Академии, после чего был высмеян людьми. Тогда бросив академию Азли решил занятся алхимией и случайно сделал эликсир бессмертия. Погрузившись в исследования Азли не заметил как прошло много времени.  
После 5000 лет исследований он стал волшебником, но кое-что он упустил. Люди, которым он хотел отомстить, давно умерли. Потеряв свою цель, Азли решил отправиться в путешествие со своим другом Почи, чтобы посмотреть, как изменился мир спустя 5000 лет. Что же его ждёт впереди?!
description.pt-br: Quando ele era jovem, ele falhou na Academia de Magia e foi menosprezado por outros. No entanto, por acaso, ele descobriu um remédio mitológico, então ele obteve um corpo imortal. Para se vingar das pessoas que zombavam dele, ele começou a pesquisar magia e artefatos mágicos diferentes da academia. Após 5000 anos de pesquisa, ele se tornou um antigo usuário de magia antes de perceber. As pessoas que ele estava procurando vingança se foram a muito tempo; Perdendo seu propósito, Asley foi em uma viagem para ver o mundo depois de 5000 anos com sua familiar Pochi. Com uma virada inesperada de eventos depois de ajudar muitos humanos, ele agora está vivendo na academia de magia. Um homem de 5000 anos com uma jovem aparência Asley, como ele vai viver a juventude da sua segunda vida? - Baseado em um romance/novela

description.en:
What appeared before high school student, Yuuki, was a mysterious cute girl—Ai Roborovskii!! The truth was that she was a robot created by the hands of Yuuki's father who was a professor in Robotics. And this Ai's strongest weapon was…eroticism!? A super slapstick, robotic, erotic comedy!!  
  
**Included one-shots:**  
Volume 2:  
- E-Robot *(Pilot)*  
- SUPER hERO *(Previously unpublished; The 66th JUMP Treasure Newcomer Manga Award honorable mention (2013))*  
  
As a part of the JUMP START initiative, the first three chapters of E→Robot were published in English in VIZ Media's digital Weekly Shonen Jump.

description.en: A peek into the "everyday nudity" of high school girls. Virgins’ Empire is a look into the lives of seven high school girls attending an all girls school. We follow them as they grow relationships with one another. Some more intimate than others.

description.en: Komichi Shijou, the most famous person at her school, was troubled. Despite being a romantic comedy manga artist, she had no understanding of 'the feeling of love' was stuck in a creative slump. One day, a certain boy and girl appear before her. With their arrival, Komichi Shijou's investigation into 'genuine love' begins…!?
description.ja: 学校イチの有名人・四條恋路は悩んでました。なぜならラブコメ漫画家なのに、彼女には“恋する気持ち”がまったくわからず、スランプになってしまったからです。 そんな彼女の前にひと組の男女が現れます。その男女との出会いにより、彼女・四條恋路による“ホンモノの恋”への探求が始まるのでした…！？『恋愛』を綴る天才漫画家少女はホンモノの“恋”を知らないーー！？
description.pt-br: Komichi Shijou, a pessoa mais famosa da escola, estava preocupada. Apesar de ser uma artista de mangá de comédia romântica, ela não tinha nenhuma compreensão do "sentimento do amor" e estava presa em uma crise criativa. Um dia, um certo garoto e uma garota aparecem diante dela. Com a chegada deles, a investigação de Komichi Shijou sobre o "amor genuíno" começa...!?

title.en: My Food Seems to Be Very Cute

altTitles.zh: 我的食物看起来很可爱

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǒ de shíwù kàn qǐlái hěn kě'ài

altTitles.zh-hk: 我的食物看起來很可愛

description.en: A vampire who has been sleeping for nearly two hundred years, Maria is awakened by a passing werewolf girl by a chance, and the moment the coffin is opened, the curse falls on the werewolf girl. The two girls set foot on the journey to the city
description.es-la: Maria, una vampiro que había estado durmiendo por casi doscientos años, es despertada por Xing Lan, una chica lobo que pasaba por ahí. Cuando el ataúd se abre, una maldición cae sobre Xing Lan. Sin embargo, en lugar de asustarse, la inocente Xing Lan cree haber encontrado una excelente compañera, y ambas embarcan juntas un viaje a la ciudad. Así comienza su historia.

title.en: A Middle-Aged Man Who Returns From Another World Goes Back to When He Was 17 and Becomes Unbeatable

altTitles.ja: 異世界帰りのアラフォーリーマン、17歳の頃に戻って無双する

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai Kaeri no Arafour Riiman, 17-sai no Koro ni Modotte Musou suru

description.en:
A black company employee in his 40s, Namba Kazu, died of overwork and was reincarnated to another world. After saving the world, he returns to find himself regressed to his 17-year-old self. 

Kazu realizes that he can use the abilities he acquired from another world and is excited to restart his life over again. However, through the help of his childhood friend, Yui, he learns of the existence of human-eating abomination called Variant in the world he was born in. 

Kazu knows from his past memories that Yui will die in the near future. In order to save Yui, who is on a mission to fight against variants, Kazu decided to throw himself into battle in this world as well.
description.ja:
過労死で異世界に転生したアラフォーリーマンの難波カズ。17歳で異世界を救ったカズは、女神に「元の世界に戻してくれ」と願う。てっきり元のアラフォーリーマンに戻ると思っていたら、17歳の高校生に戻っていた。

それならばと気楽に90年代を満喫しようとしていたが、幼馴染みの由依をきっかけに『人間を喰う異形ヴァリアント』の存在を知り、カズは異世界チートを武器にこの世界でも戦いに身を投じていく…!
description.es-la: Kazu Nanba reencarnó después de la muerte por exceso de trabajo y salvó otro mundo. A la edad de 17 años en el otro mundo después de morir derrotando al rey demonio elije "regresara a su mundo original". Pensó que regresaría a su trabajo normal, pero regreso como un estudiante de secundaria de 17 años. Sin embargo ahora se entera que hay "extrañas criaturas" que matan humanos y donde Kazu recordara un recuerdo pasado donde su amiga de la infancia Yui morirá en un futuro cercano. Esta vez, para salvar a Yui, Kazu usará el poder de otro mundo para lanzarse también a la batalla en este mundo.

altTitles.ja: アオのハコ

description.en:
Taiki Inomata is on the boys' badminton team at sports powerhouse Eimei Junior and Senior High. He's in love with basketball player Chinatsu Kano, the older girl he trains alongside every morning in the gym. One Spring day, their relationship takes a sharp turn ... And thus begins this brand-new series of love, sports and youth!

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media (2023)
description.fr:
Taiki Inomata, membre du club de badminton, a eu le coup de foudre pour Chinatsu Kano, la star du club de basket de son établissement. Il s'entraîne à ses côtés tous les matins. Sa relation avec Chinatsu va prendre un tournant totalement inédit lorsqu'un jour de printemps, une nouvelle des plus déconcertantes va lui offrir une opportunité inespérée de conquérir sa belle.

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Delcourt/Tonkam**
description.ja: バドミントン部に所属する猪股大喜（いのまたたいき）は、女子バスケ部の先輩・鹿野千夏（かのちなつ）に恋をしていた――。自主練を真摯に取り組む姿に心惹かれていたが、思いもよらぬ事実が発覚し…!?　道のりは遠く、想いは近く。
description.kk: Тайки Иномата - спортқа терең бағытталған Еймей орта және жоғары мектебінің бадминтон тобында ойнайды. Ол әр таң сайын мектеп спортзалында онымен бірге жаттығатын Чинацу Кано атты үздік баскетболшы сенпайға ғашық. Бір күні олардың қарым - қатынасы өзгеріске ұшырап, арасындағы қашықтық жойыла бастады... Осылай, көктемнің бір кезінде мектеп спорт залында тағы да бір махаббат, спорт және жастық шақ оқиғасы басталды.
description.tl: Si Taiki Inomata ay nasa boys' badminton team na sports powerhouse ng Eimei Junior at Senior High. In love siya sa basketball player na si Chinatsu Kano, ang babaeng mas matanda sa kaniya na kasama niya magpraktis kada umaga sa gym. Isang araw, ang kanilang relasyon ay biglang nagbago.
description.uk:
Тайкі Іномата — учасник команди з бадмінтону, який вчиться у школі Еймей. Щодня він намагається прийти до школи якомога раніше, але його завжди випереджає Чінацу Кано, в яку він закоханий.

Чінацу — зірка команди з баскетболу. Хоч Тайкі добре грає в бадмінтон, він далеко не настільки популярний, як Чінацу, що робить шанси на взаємну симпатію низькими. Але за дивним поворотом долі Чінацу починає жити в його будинку.
description.vi:
Taiki Inomata, năm ba sơ trung, là thành viên của đội cầu lông. Kể từ khi tập luyện cùng với đội cầu lông, cậu luôn cố đến sớm nhất có thể, thế nhưng, cậu chỉ là người thứ hai đến nhà đa năng. Bởi vì người đầu tiên luôn đến sớm nhất, chính là Chinatsu Kano, năm nhất cao trung, và là người mà cậu thích.

Vì sự chênh lệch giữa mức độ nổi tiếng mà cậu cảm thấy mình không thể kéo gần khoảng cách với cô ấy. Thế nhưng...

Vào một ngày đẹp trời, vì chuyện gia đình, Chinatsu Kano đã đến sống chung với Taiki Inomata.

Với cơ hội ngàn năm có một này, với cái flag romcom to hơn núi Phú Sĩ này, liệu rằng cậu chàng Taiki có thể làm nên chuyện hay không?
description.es-la: Taiki Inomata forma parte del equipo masculino de bádminton en el prestigioso instituto deportivo Eimei Junior y Senior High. Su corazón late por Chinatsu Kano, la hábil jugadora de baloncesto con la que comparte entrenamientos matutinos en el gimnasio. En un día primaveral, su relación da un giro sorprendente… Y así se inicia esta nueva serie que combina amor, deportes y la efervescencia de la juventud.
description.pt-br: Taiki Inomata está na equipe de Badminton dos meninos na Powerhouse Esportiva Eimei Junior e Senior High. Ele está apaixonado por jogador de basquete Chinatsu Kano, a menina mais velha que ele treina ao lado de todas as manhãs no ginásio. Um dia de primavera, seu relacionamento tem uma virada acentuada ... e assim começa esta nova série de amor, esportes e jovens!

title.en: Isekai Kaeri no Yuusha wa, Dungeon ga Shutsugen shita Genjitsu Sekai de, Influencer natte Kane wo Kasegimasu!

altTitles.ja: 異世界帰りの勇者は、ダンジョンが出現した現実世界で、インフルエンサーになって金を稼ぎます！

altTitles.en: The Hero Returns from Another World, Becomes an Influencer, and Earns Money in the Real World, Where Dungeons have Appeared!

description.en: One day, an ordinary high school student is transferred to another world. He raises his level in the other world, successfully defeats the Demon King, and saves the world! With his strongest status, he decided to return to his own world; however, in the world to which he returns, a new "dungeon" has appeared.
description.ja: ある日異世界へ召喚された普通の高校生が、着実にモンスターを倒しレベルを上げ、無事魔王を倒し、世界を救うことに成功！　その最強ステータスのまま現実社会に帰還することに――！？
description.es-la: Un día, un estudiante de secundaria normal y corriente es llevado a otro mundo. Sube su nivel en el otro mundo, derrota con éxito al Rey Demonio y salva el mundo. Con su nivel más fuerte, decide volver a su mundo. Sin embargo, en el mundo al que regresa, ha aparecido también una nueva "mazmorra". Una moderna fantasía de mazmorras en la que el antiguo héroe se convierte en un guerrero, ¡que se adentra en las mazmorras creadas en su propio mundo!

title.en: The Martial God Who Regressed Back to Level 2

altTitles.en: The God of War Who Regressed to Level 2

altTitles.es-la: El dios marcial que regresó al nivel 2

description.en:
[NO. 4212: 'Humanity' has failed the Demotion Match.]
[NO. 4212: ‘Humanity’ has been deemed useless. Beginning deletion.]

Earth lost the fight for survival in the BattleNet system and humanity now faces eradication. However, Jihan Seong is given another chance. He has returned three years into the past before BattleNet became a life-or-death game.

With his knowledge of the future, he’s determined to become the strongest player. Will Jihan be able to change the fate of humanity? And more importantly, can he protect the ones he loves from those who want him to fail?

As children, Billy promised Kirika, an oni girl, that he would always protect her even after they got older. Ten years have passed since that promise and it looks like the roles have reversed?
___
Original comic posted by PeaCh88 on twitter.
description.pt-br: Quando crianças, Billy prometeu a Kirika, uma garota oni, que iria sempre a proteger mesmo depois de mais velhos. Dez anos já se passaram desde essa promessa e parece que os papeis se inverteram?

altTitles.ja: リクドウ

description.en:
Riku experienced a lot of pain and tragedy in his early life. After his father's death, a former-boxer Yakuza man taught him how to do a basic punch, and that punch saved his life when he had to defend himself from his mom's drug dealer. He ended up taking the drug dealer's life, marking him as a killer. Criminals continued to come after him, leading to more tragedy for the people who attempted to care for him. All of this drove him to ask that same former boxer to teach him to become stronger, which led him to a rundown gym, his door to the world of pro boxing!  
  
**Officially published:**  
- In french by [Kazé](http://manga.kaze.fr/catalogue/ri_ku_la_rage_aux_poings) as "Riku-Do, La rage aux poings"  
- In italian by [J-Pop](https://www.j-pop.it/855-rikudo)
description.es: Riku Akutou, un chico que ha perdido a su padre, conoce a Kyosuke Tokorozawa, un antiguo boxeador que se dedica a cobrar deudas. En un mundo lleno de sinrazón, ¿qué utiliza la gente como guía para sobrevivir? ¿Pelearán? ¡Esta es la historia de la increíble lucha a puñetazos de Riku Akutou mientras recorre el espinoso camino de la vida!　El chico no tiene nada. Excepto por sus puños.
description.ja: 父親を失った少年・芥生リクは借金取りの元ボクサー・所沢京介と出会う。理不尽に満ちたこの世界で、人は何をよすがに生き抜くのか。戦うのか。人生という茨の道を歩む芥生リクの破格の拳闘ストーリー！　少年には何もない。その拳以外は。
description.es-la: Riku experimentó mucho dolor y tragedia en sus primeros años de vida. Tras la muerte de su padre, un antiguo boxeador de la Yakuza le enseñó a dar un puñetazo básico, y ese puñetazo le salvó la vida cuando tuvo que defenderse del traficante de drogas de su madre. Acabó quitándole la vida al traficante, marcándolo como un asesino. Los delincuentes siguieron persiguiéndolo, lo que provocó más tragedias para las personas que intentaron cuidarlo. Todo esto le llevó a pedir a ese mismo ex boxeador que le enseñara a ser más fuerte, lo que le llevó a un gimnasio en decadencia, ¡su puerta al mundo del boxeo profesional!
description.pt-br: Riku passou por muita dor e tragédia em sua vida precoce. Após a morte de seu pai, um ex-boxeador membro da máfia Yakuza ensinou-lhe como dar um soco básico, e esse soco salvou sua vida quando ele teve que se defender do traficante de drogas de sua mãe. Acabou tirando a vida do traficante, marcando-o como um assassino. Criminosos continuaram a persegui-lo, resultando em mais tragédias para as pessoas que tentaram cuidar dele. Tudo isso o levou a pedir ao mesmo ex-boxeador que o ensinasse a se tornar mais forte, o que o levou a um ginásio decadente, sua porta de entrada para o mundo do boxe profissional!

title.en: Raising the Princess After Her Death

altTitles.en: A Princess Is Raised After Death
The Princess Is Raised After She Dies

altTitles.ja: 正規エンディングまで異世界ループ転生

altTitles.en: Raising the Princess to Overcome Death

description.en:
Long-term public service exam candidate Minseo finds himself trapped in the game, "Raising Lena", as he tries to escape his grim reality. 

In the game, Minseo becomes a character named Leo, and he must navigate through a world with three different scenarios to accomplish his mission of turning the game's protagonist, Lena, into a princess. However, "Raising Lena" boasts an overwhelming level of difficulty due to enemies who are set to thwart Minseo with their immense power and influence.

Will Minseo be able to complete the game by making Lena a princess and return to reality?

title.en: More Than Lovers, Less Than Friends

altTitles.ja: 恋人以上友人未満

altTitles.en: More Than Lovers, Less Than Friends

altTitles.pt-br: Mais Que Amantes, Menos Que Amigos

altTitles.ru: Больше чем любовники, меньше чем друзья

description.en: Ex-AV star Miyako unexpectedly runs into a former coworker at a marriage interview...?! The secretly connected pair are bursting with more pure energy than you can imagine! This cute adult love comedy hits different and will heal your soul.
description.ja: 東京から地元へ戻った宮子のお見合い相手は互いの秘密を握る元お仕事相手だった！　清楚な文学少女を演じていた元AV女優とオラオラ系男を演じていた元AV男優が素の自分に戻って再会した時、この上もなくピュアなラブが始まる…！カラダは恋人以上、ココロは友人未満!?
description.ru: Мияко, уволившаяся с работы и вернувшаяся в родительский дом, затеяла сватовство. Однако второй стороной оказался бывший коллега, знавший разные секреты.
description.pt-br:
A ex-estrela de AV(Adult Videos) Miyako inesperadamente encontra um ex-colega de trabalho em uma entrevista de casamento...?! O par secretamente conectado está repleto de energia mais pura do que você pode imaginar! 

Esta comédia de amor adulto é diferente e vai curar sua alma.

description.en:
In Aeria, a place where people from various worlds are summoned, the weak are destined to die.

Lee Sungmin, a talentless mercenary, was no exception. Fortunately for him, a mysterious item he finds before his untimely death sends him back to the past.

Now a 13-year-old with a second chance at life, Sungmin begins his desperate journey to become Aeria's strongest with no money or talent.

Will effort alone be enough to make a hero of a boy with absolutely nothing?
description.ko:
이세계 '에리아'에 소환된 평범한 중학생 이성민.
아무런 재능도 기연도 없이 오로지 살아남기 위해 갖은 고초를 겪으며 십수년을 버티지만, 결국 비참하게 목숨을 잃고 만다.

그러나 죽기 전, 우연히 손에 얻은 '전생의 돌'에 의해 과거로 회귀하게 되고
다시금 새로운 삶을 손에 얻게 된다.

그러나 여전히 재능도 뭣도 없는 쥐뿔도 없는 인생.
범접할 수 없는 천재들에게 번번이 높은 벽을 느끼고
강한 열등감에 시달리지만,
포기하지 않고 굳은 의지와 결심으로 한 걸음씩 나아간다.

"어떻게든 발버둥 쳐서라도, 전생보다 나은 삶을 살겠어!"

인기 웹소설 <쥐뿔도 없는 회귀> 웹툰화!

---

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%A5%90%EB%BF%94%EB%8F%84-%EC%97%86%EB%8A%94-%ED%9A%8C%EA%B7%80/2799)

altTitles.ja: みゆちゃんはずっと友達

altTitles.en: Miyu-chan Will Always Be Your Friend

description.en: In the summer of his second year of high school, Yuushin Tahara finds that his childhood friend, Miyu Fukagawa, who had moved away, has returned to the house next door. Although Miyu has grown up to be quite cute, there's something a little strange about her...
description.es: En el verano de su segundo año de instituto, su amiga de la infancia Miyu Fukagawa vuelve a la casa de al lado del protagonista, Yuushin Tahara, después de haberse separado cuando se mudó. Miyu-chan ha crecido y se ha vuelto mucho más guapa, pero hay algo un poco extraño en ella...? Se trata de una comedia de suspenso y amor con una nueva sensación, en la que el demasiado amable protagonista y su simpática pero muy divertida amiga de la infancia ¡se desenvuelven con sus amigos!
description.ja: 高校2年生の夏、主人公・田原優心の隣の家に、引っ越しで別れてしまった幼馴染・深川みゆちゃんが帰ってきた。すっかり大きく可愛くなったみゆちゃんだけど、どこかちょっとヘンで…？
description.zh: 在高二夏天，主人公·田原优心与小学毕业时因搬家被迫分别的青梅竹马·深川美羽重逢了。虽然长大后的美羽变得很可爱，但是哪里有点奇怪……？过于温柔的主人公，与惹人喜爱却处处充满疑点的青梅竹马之间展开的新颖青春恋爱悬疑喜剧！
description.es-la: En el verano de su segundo año de instituto, su amiga de la infancia Miyu Fukagawa vuelve a la casa de al lado del protagonista, Yuushin Tahara, después de haberse separado cuando se mudó. Miyu-chan ha crecido y se ha vuelto mucho más guapa, pero hay algo un poco extraño en ella...? Se trata de una comedia de suspenso y amor con una nueva sensación, en la que el demasiado amable protagonista y su simpática pero muy divertida amiga de la infancia ¡se desenvuelven con sus amigos!
description.pt-br:
No verão do seu segundo ano do ensino médio, Tahara Yuushin descobre que sua amiga de infância, Fukagawa Miyu, que havia se mudado, retornou para a casa ao lado. Embora Miyu tenha se tornado uma garota bastante fofa, há algo um pouco estranho sobre ela...

Uma comédia romântica com toques de suspense, centrada em um protagonista gentil e sua amiga de infância adorável, porém um tanto excêntrica.

description.en: A transfer student desperately seeking someone to relate to pursues the attention of a mysterious boy covered in bandages, thinking he might finally be able to build a friendship for the first time since a tragic accident.

altTitles.vi: Bị Che Khuất Bởi Ánh Mặt Trời Lặn
Tà dương trong đôi mắt vô hồn

altTitles.ru: Закат, отражённый в её ледяном взгляде

description.en:
The witch Hildegar, who received the blessing of the Sun Goddess Karia, is known far and wide for her fearsome reputation.  
The Northerner Elkin, who lost his homeland, chases after the witch towards a nameless castle…
description.ko:
태양의 신 카리야의 가호를 받은 마녀 '힐데가르'.
고향을 잃은 북부인 '에르킨'은 마녀를 쫓아 이름 없는 성으로 향한다.

altTitles.th: จอมเวทไร้ขีดจำกัด

altTitles.ja: 無限の魔法使い

description.en:
After Sirone was abandoned in a stable, he was found by a family of hunters and raised in a loving home. 

Despite the hardships of the peasant life, he learned how to read from a young age and became obsessed with books, especially ones on the history of magic. One day, he has an unlikely encounter with a mage and learns how to enter the "spirit zone," the first step to learning how to use magic. 

Although they say only nobles can be mages, will Sirone be able to prove his infinite potential?

altTitles.ja: 魔法行商人ロマ

description.en:
Roma is a mysterious girl that is on a mission to collect “human greed” through the use of various magical objects that have unique powers. When humans use these magical items to satisfy their own personal emotions, such as love, their greed level increases and Roma is able to steal their excess greed.  
  
The people that use Roma’s objects seem to always let their greed destroy themselves, putting themselves in a worse situation than before.

title.en: Fate/Grand Order -Epic of Remnant- Pseudo-Singularity IV: The Forbidden Advent Garden, Salem - Heretical Salem

altTitles.ja: フェイト／グランドオーダー　エピック　オブ　レムナント　亜種特異点Ⅳ 禁忌降臨庭園 セイレム 異端なるセイレム

altTitles.ja-ro: Fate/Grand Order -Epic of Remnant- Ashu Tokuiten IV: Kinki Kourin Teien, Salem - Itan naru Salem

altTitles.ru: Судьба/Великий приказ: Эпопея Остатка-Псевдосингулярность IV: Запретный сад Адвента, Салем-Салем Ереси

altTitles.vi: Dị Điểm Á Chủng IV - Khu Vườn Giáng Lâm Cấm Kỵ Salem - Salem Dị Giáo

description.en: As a result of the efforts of the people of Chaldea, the human incineration plan of those who called themselves the Magic King was bitterly stopped at the water's edge, and the destiny of the world seemed to be breathing again. However, suddenly, the singularity of the same level as the singularity so far is observed in modern times. A master who has opened up the future once again puts himself into a layershift to calm down the "subspecies singularities" that appeared in the cursed land "Salem."
description.ru: Халдея во главе с Рицука Фуджимару, мастером, проникшим на проклятую землю «Салем», чтобы ответить на новую «особенность». "Я встретила двух девушек Эбигейл и Лавинию".

altTitles.ja: ビッグオーダー

description.en:
The manga's story centers on an introverted high school student named Eiji Hoshimiya with a huge secret — he wished for the destruction of the world when he was younger. Fairies give certain people special powers called Orders. What Order Users can do with their power depends on their wishes. 10 years after the Great Destruction, Eiji struggles to come to terms with his immense power.

description.en: April! Sawaya Doji's college life at his dream school of Seio University starts with an encounter with the beautiful Kaede Hoshimi during the club recruiting fair. Sawaya believes that if he goes to Tokyo... if he joins a university... if he joins a club, he can get a girlfriend! It's a great way to meet new people, but what kind of club has he gotten himself into?
description.ja: ４月！憧れの青応大学へと入学した大学１年生・沢屋童二は、サークル勧誘期に美少女・星見楓と出会う。「東京に行けば…大学に入れば…サークルに入れば、彼女ができる！」と信じる沢屋は星見楓とともに派手目なサークルの新歓コンパへと参加するが……。沢屋が足を踏み入れたサークルの罪深き実態、秘密とは何か！？
description.pt-br: Abril! A vida universitária de Sawaya Doji em sua escola de sonho da Universidade de Seio começa com um encontro com a bela Kaede Hoshimi durante a feira de recrutamento do clube. Sawaya acredita que se ele for para Tóquio... se ele entrar em uma universidade... se ele entrar em um clube, ele pode conseguir uma namorada! É uma ótima maneira de conhecer novas pessoas, mas em que tipo de clube ele se meteu?

"Mr. HPL! Have you decided?"

description.ja: 嘔吐、中毒、便秘、ワクチン等々、その時、猫の体内では何が起こっているのか！？猫と健康的に暮らすために知っておきたい情報満載。『はたらく細胞』の猫版！

In said town lives Hifumi, a middle school boy, who one day encounters a girl who just moved in... Help "correct" the supernatural in this action-packed tale from Yasuki Tanaka, creator of "Summer Time Rendering"!

After being held in disdain and having his life put in danger, an orphan from the Demonic Cult, Cheon Yeo-Woon, has an unexpected visit from his descendant from the future who inserts a nano machine into Cheon Yeo-Woon's body, which drastically changes Cheon Yeo-Woon's life after its activation. The story of Cheon Yeo-Woon's journey of bypassing the Demonic Cult and rising to become the best martial artist has just begun.

「未来の力を手に入れ、邪悪な魔教に立ち向かう！」 魔教の私生児として生まれた主人公・天黎雲。 幼い頃から卑しまれ、後継者争いで命を狙われる。 死に物狂いの抵抗もむなしく、危うく命を落としかねない絶体絶命のピンチに･･･！ その瞬間、突如現れた謎の男から「ナノマシン」と呼ばれる未来の力を注入され、 目覚めるととてつもない力を手に入れていた。 魔教を超え、最強の武人を目指す天黎雲の物語が幕を開ける！

description.ru:
Чен Еун — незаконнорожденный принц, появившийся на свет без единой частички Нейгуна. С самого раннего детства он находился под гнетом всеобщего отвращения. Весь забитый, с отсутствием какой-либо мотивации, год за годом Еун влачил свое жалкое существование. Ни на что не рассчитывая... и не претендуя.

Будучи изгоем, исконно презираемым шестью великими кланами, в один прекрасный день он оказался в окружении десятка подосланных убийц. Когда глаза практически застлала пелена белого света... и казалось, он уже начал теряться, проваливаясь в пучину... безграничного отчаяния, на горизонте возникла еле заметная фигура.

Неизвестный "потомок", снизошедший из будущего, в мгновение ока уничтожил всех врагов. Прошептав нечто невнятное, он подсадил в тело нашего героя какой-то странный предмет... наномашину. С этого момента все кардинально переменилось. Поселившийся где-то внутри искусственный интеллект дал его жизни невероятный толчок.

Больше не будет как прежде. Это... новая ветвь истории. Истории о парне, который бросил вызов небесам.

title.en: Houkago, Boku wa Kimi ni Naru

altTitles.ja: 放課後、ぼくは君になる

description.en: Akiba, a high school boy who has become addicted to cross-dressing cosplay, devotes himself to emulating his "oshi." Then one day, while he was dressed up as his favorite character, all alone in the club room, he is found out by Shibuya, a gorgeous gal that he has a crush on...? This is the start of a secret relationship between these two polar opposites! They will apply their youthful enthusiasm to a life of "oshi promotion"!
description.ja: コスプレ沼にハマった高校生・秋葉はひとりぼっちで推し活に励んでいた。そんな中、こっそり部室で推しのコスプレをしていたら、憧れていた顔面天才な美女ギャル・渋谷さんに見られてしまい…!?

altTitles.ja: 2.5次元の誘惑

altTitles.th: 2.5 มิติ ริริสะ

description.en:
From Seven Seas:
“I have no interest in real girls!” So claims Okumura, the president of the school’s manga club. He’s your typical otaku, obsessed with a sexy (fictional) 2D manga character known as Liliel. Then the new school year starts, and a (real!) 3D girl named Lilysa whose passion is cosplay joins the club. Lilysa convinces Okumura to become her photographer–and guess who her favorite manga character is? Not only that, but Lilysa is into modeling the fetishy stuff, The boundaries between 2D and 3D start to blur as this hot-blooded romantic comedy unfolds.

English volumes by [Seven Seas Entertainment](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/2-5-dimensional-seduction/)
description.ja: 現実の女に興味無し！俺の嫁・リリエルは2次元にあり！そんな漫研部長・奥村の前に現れたのは…リアルなリリエル？ドキドキコスプレコメディ開幕！
description.pt:
"Eu não estou interessado em uma mulher real! Minha waifu Liliel está no mundo 2D!" Okumura, presidente do clube de mangá, um dia na sua frente apareceu… uma Liliel real?  
Uma super comédia empolgante começa!
description.pt-br: "Eu não estou interessado em uma mulher real! Minha waifu, Liriel está no mundo 2D!" Okumura, presidente do clube de mangá, um dia na sua frente apareceu... uma Liriel real? Uma super comédia empolgante começa!

description.en: The Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's manga is a spin-off of its anime series. Like the Yu-Gi-Oh! GX manga, the events that take place, as well as the cards used by characters differ from those in the anime. It was published monthly in the V Jump magazine in Japanese, and has been released in English via the Shonen Jump magazine starting with the January 2011 issue. It began serialization on August 21, 2009, and ended on January 21, 2015, with a bonus chapter being announced to be included in the final volume. The author of the manga is Masahiro Hikokubo and the artist of the manga is Masashi Satō. The manga is supervised by Kazuki Takahashi.
description.pt-br: Em uma versão alternativa de Yu☆Gi☆Oh 5D's, Yuusei e seu amigo, Sect, estão duelando em Satellite quando um Cavaleiro Esqueleto de uma lenda urbana aparece, forçando Yuusei a duelar com ele pela liberdade de Sect. Em Neo-Domino, Rex Godwin está planejando um torneio conhecido como o Grand Prix D1 enquanto Jack se dirige para Satellite e confronta Yuusei, que nesta versão, parece não saber...

title.en: Yarinaoshi Reijou wa Ryuutei Heika wo Kouryaku-chuu

altTitles.ja: やり直し令嬢は竜帝陛下を攻略中

altTitles.en: The Do-Over Damsel Conquers the Dragon Emperor

altTitles.zh: 重生大小姐正在攻略龙帝殿下

altTitles.id: Seorang Putri Yang Kembali Ke Masa Lalu Sedang Menaklukkan Kaisar Naga

altTitles.it: La nobildonna ritornata nel bel mezzo della conquista di Sua Maestà l'Imperatore Drago

altTitles.es: ¡Vence al Emperador Dragón en esta ronda, Señorita!

altTitles.vi: Tiểu Thư Trùng Sinh chinh phục Long Đế Bệ Hạ
小姐重生征服龍帝陛下 (Nom Script)

description.en: The curtains rise on the tale of a young lady who once stormed the battlefields now getting to start her life all over again! The young noblewoman, Jill, was sentenced to death by her fiancé, the Crown Prince. Just as she was on the brink of death, time rewinds back to when she was 10 years old, to the party where her engagement had been decided! Determined to avoid going down the same path to ruin, Jill hastily proposes to the person behind her, only to discover that he’s none other than Hades, the Emperor of the neighboring kingdom who’s (set to) fall into darkness, ergo the worst villain.
description.id:
Jill Savelle- seorang tunangan dari pangeran putra mahkota Gerald de Kleitos yang memiliki gelar "Dewi Perang"- telah diburu oleh negaranya sendiri yang telah dilindunginya. Dikhianati oleh pasangannya sendiri, dia difitnah sebagai sorang penghianat kemudian dijebloskan kedalam penjara. Di waktu-waktu terakhirnya, Jill memiliki banyak penyesalan, tapi ketika ajal sedang menjemputnya, dia tiba-tiba saja terbangun pada saat 6 tahun lalu. Dan kali ini, dia telah bertekad untuk tidak diperalat lagi.

Sekarang, sebagai seorang gadis berusia 10 tahun, Jill memutuskan untuk melarikan diri dari pertunangan dengan pangeran yang menghampirinya. Dan pada akhirnya, dia secara tidak sengaja melamar pria berumur 19 tahun yang dikenal sebagai kaisar naga hades theos rave, yang nantinya akan menghancurkan negaranya. Tapi tanpa disangka, dia malah menerima lamarannya!

Berbanding terbalik dengan ingatan Jill yang dulu, sekarang Jill melihat kalau Hades yang saat ini merupakan seorang kaisar yang sedang tidak beruntung.  Jadi bisakah Jill mencegah sang kaisar terjatuh kedalam jurang kegelapan? ataukah malah nasibnya sudah tidak bisa diubah lagi?
description.ja: 婚約者の王太子から処刑を言い渡された令嬢・ジル。その死の間際に、婚約が決まった当時10歳のパーティーまで時が巻き戻る！破滅ルートを回避するべくとっさに後ろにいた人に求婚するが、相手は最大の敵、隣国の闇落ち（予定）皇帝・ハディスだった――。「あなたを必ず更生――いえ、しあわせにいたします。」

title.en: Tearmoon Empire: Collection of Short Stories

altTitles.ja: ティアムーン帝国物語短編集@COMIC

description.en:
A collection of stories of tragedy and joy told from the perspective of Mia and those around her, from the original and current timelines.

Manga adaption of the collection of short stories side volume of the light novel.

title.en: The Daily Life of a Middle-Aged Online Shopper in Another World

altTitles.ja: アラフォー男の異世界通販生活

altTitles.ja-ro: Arafoo Otoko no Isekai Tsuhan Seikatsu
Around 40 Otoko no Isekai Tsuuhan Seikatsu

altTitles.zh: 中年男的异世界网购生活

altTitles.zh-hk: 四十左右男的異世界網購生活

altTitles.id: Kehidupan pria paruh baya berbelanja daring di dunia lain

altTitles.pt-br: A vida por correspondência de um homem de cerca de 40 anos em outro mundo

description.en:
Kenichi, a single man in his 40s, is transported into another world for no apparent reason. As he tries to escape a dangerous forest teaming with monsters, he realizes he has the power to access to a huge online store.

By using this power to exchange goods he found in this new world for cash, and then buying modern ones off the internet, he was able to quickly create a very popular business. However, his goal is to have a slow and leisurely life. Instead of growing his business even more, he decides to settle down and live off of the power of Jeff Bezos.
___
[web novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n2945eg/) (jp)
description.ja: 突如異世界に転移してしまったアラフォーの独身男ケンイチ。訳もわからぬまま、異世界の危険な森を進んでいく中で、巨大ネット通販サイトが使えることに気がつく。ケンイチはそのチート能力を使い、異世界でのスローライフを目指す…！
description.ru: История о мужчине средних лет, который делает все, что хочет, с помощью покупок в Интернете в один клик!
description.pt-br:
A história de um homem de meia idade fazendo o que quiser com o poder das compras online com um clique!
Kenichi, um homem solteiro de 40 anos, é transportado para outro mundo sem motivo aparente. Enquanto ele tenta escapar de uma floresta perigosa se unindo a monstros, ele percebe que tem o poder de acessar uma enorme loja online.

altTitles.th: สงครามเย็นสุดขั้ว

description.en: The Ice Age apocalypse is coming. After being betrayed and killed by my secret crush, I was reborn and gained a magical ability - the snacks I ate suddenly turned into plants? What's surprising is that this ability can be used in this way... Crisis is everywhere, I want to live for myself in this life!

altTitles.es: El esclavo de la élite de soldados de Mato

altTitles.en: Slave of the Magic Capital's Elite Troops

altTitles.ja: 魔都精兵のスレイブ

altTitles.vi: Nô lệ của đội tinh nhuệ Ma đô

description.en:
The demon-filled dimension known as "Mato" has opened to threaten humanity, and a type of "peach" tree that grows there yields fruit that confers special powers to those who eat it, giving humanity a fighting chance, but this only works for women. As such, as protectors of humanity, women rise in social status while men are relegated to second-class citizens scraping for basic occupation and acknowledgment.   
  
Cue Yuuki Wakura, a domestically crafty and laborious high school senior whose older sister was taken during a Mato event 5 years before; while lamenting the hardships of the life ahead of him, an event opens before him, and while being rescued from demons by Captain Kyouka of the Anti-Demon Corps, she confers him powers as her "slave" and turns him into a mighty beast mount that mows down the demons.   
  
However, there is a surprising price to pay for being her "slave"… and it's not him who has to pay it.
description.fr:
La dimension démoniaque connue sous le nom de "Mato" s'est ouverte pour menacer l'humanité, et une sorte de "pêcher" qui y pousse donne des fruits qui confèrent des pouvoirs spéciaux à ceux qui les mangent, donnant à l'humanité une chance de se battre, mais cela ne fonctionne que pour les femmes. Ainsi, en tant que protectrices de l'humanité, les femmes gagnent en statut social tandis que les hommes sont relégués à des citoyens de seconde zone qui se battent pour une occupation et une reconnaissance de base.  
  
Cue Yuuki Wakura, une lycéenne rusée et laborieuse dont la sœur aînée a été enlevée lors d'un événement du Mato 5 ans auparavant ; alors qu'elle se lamente sur les difficultés de la vie qui l'attend, un événement s'ouvre devant elle, et alors qu'elle est sauvée des démons par le capitaine Kyouka du Corps Anti-Démon, elle lui confère ses pouvoirs d'"esclave" et le transforme en un puissant monticule animal qui fauche les démons.  
  
Cependant, il y a un prix surprenant à payer pour être son "esclave"… et ce n'est pas lui qui doit le payer.  


---

description.ru:
Эта боевая фентезийная манга повествует о нескольких героинях, что защищают людей в альтернативном пространстве, именуемом Мато (Город Демонов).  


---
description.vi:
Chiều không gian đầy quỷ dữ được gọi là "Ma đô" đã mở ra đe dọa đối với loài người. Tại đó, có một loài  "đào" ban cho kẻ ăn sức mạnh đặc biệt, giúp nhân loại có cơ hội chiến đấu, tuy nhiên, chỉ có nữ giới mới có thể sử dụng thứ sức mạnh "trái đào" ấy. Bởi vậy mà phụ nữ trở thành những người bảo vệ loài người, địa vị xã hội tăng cao, trong khi nam giới bị giáng xuống tầng lớp công dân hạng hai, giành giật nhau những công việc cơ bản và sự thừa nhận.

Nhân vật chính Yuuki Wakura, một nam sinh chăm chỉ yêu nội trợ, chị gái cậu đã bị bắt trong một sự kiện của Ma đô 5 năm về trước. Khi đang than thở về những khó khăn gặp phải, cậu đã bị lũ quỷ tấn công. Nhờ được đội trưởng Kyouka của Đội chống Quỷ kịp thời ứng cứu, cậu chấp nhận trở thành "nô lệ" của cô để có thể sở hữu sức mạnh tiêu diệt bầy quỷ.

Bất ngờ thay, việc làm "nô lệ" đòi hỏi một cái giá tương xứng...và người phải trả giá lại không phải là cậu.
description.pt-br:
A dimensão cheia de demônios conhecida como "Mato" se abriu para ameaçar a humanidade, e uma espécie de "pessegueiro" que ali cresce produz frutos que conferem poderes especiais a quem os come, dando à humanidade uma chance de lutar, mas isso só funciona para mulheres. Como tal, como protetoras da humanidade, as mulheres ascendem no estatuto social, enquanto os homens são relegados a cidadãos de segunda classe, em busca de uma ocupação básica e de reconhecimento.

 Yuuki Wakura é um estudante do último ano do ensino médio, astuto e trabalhoso, cuja irmã mais velha foi raptada durante um evento em Mato, 5 anos antes; enquanto lamenta as dificuldades da vida que tem pela frente, um evento se abre diante dele, e ao ser resgatado dos demônios pela Capitã Kyouka do Corpo Anti-Demônio, ela confere a ele poderes como seu "escravo" e o transforma em uma poderosa montaria bestial. que destrói os demônios.

No entanto, há um preço surpreendente a pagar por ele ser seu “escravo”… e não é ele quem tem que pagar.

description.en: Mini is a "Scum Detector", and her latest job is from a rich girl who wants to test her boyfriend's loyalty. However, her boyfriend, Zhao Yueming, is a straightforward gentleman, and Mini's usual methods don't work on him. This is a bit tricky for Mini, who is used to dealing with scumbags regularly. This game of tug-of-war between the womanizer and the one who understands them best is about to begin. Who will fall into the trap of love first?!

title.en: A Wicked Tale of Cinderella's Stepmom

altTitles.fr: Il était une fois la belle-mère de Cendrillon

altTitles.th: ฉันเลี้ยงได้ My Cinderella

altTitles.ja: シンデレラを大切に育てました

altTitles.zh: 身为继母的我把灰姑娘养得很好

altTitles.zh-hk: 我把灰姑娘養得亭亭玉立

altTitles.vi: Tôi Đã Nuôi Dạy Cinderella Một Cách Tử Tế

description.en:
There is a famous fairytale. A kindhearted girl whose father and stepmother got married and became a family of five with her two stepsisters. The poor girl who was condemned by her stepmother and stepsisters when her father died. The very fairytale, Cinderella. But I am not Cinderella, I am the stepmother. At the age of thirty-seven, already married twice, been widowed twice and is raising three daughters!  
  
Daniel Walford, a man who keeps approaching me while I’m busy trying to raise my three daughters.  
“Can I kiss you?”  
As a son-in law, I think he’s a little bit older but why does he keep approaching?… Oh, I don’t know.  
Once I let Cinderella marry the prince, I can live quietly.  
But is this fairytale really ‘Cinderella’?

---

- Updates every Sunday in the Kakao Page
description.hu: Mind ismerjük a mesét: az üvegcipellőt, a közel-sem-szép mostohanővéreket, és a herceggel eltöltött éjszakát, amíg éjfélt nem üt az óra. Ebbe a mesébe reinkarnálódtam, de nem Hamupipőkeként, hanem a "gonosz" mostohaanyjának a testébe! A 37 évesen már kétszer megözvegyül és három lánnyal rendelkező Mildred célja az, hogy megfelelő partnert találjon nekik és boldogan élhessenek, amíg meg nem halnak... meg talán saját magának sem volna rossz a szép jövő! De mégis ki ez a fiatal és jóképű báró, aki folyton felkeresi?
description.ru: Есть популярная сказка. О доброй девушке, чей отец женился во второй раз. О том, как пятеро человек, включая двух сводных сестёр, стали одной, большой семьёй. Однако после смерти отца мачеха и сестры стали издеваться над бедной девушкой. Это история о Золушке. Но почему я попала не в тело Золушки, а в тело её мачехи? Я стала женщиной, которая за свои 37 лет, успела дважды побывать замужем и дважды стать вдовой. Той, кому приходится растить трёх дочерей, включая Золушку. В придачу ко всему этому, ко мне пристаёт мужчина по имени Даниэль! «Можно вас поцеловать?» Что ему от меня нужно? …Я совсем запуталась. Для начала нужно выдать Золушку за принца и начать спокойную жизнь. Но правда ли, что эта сказка о Золушке?

altTitles.ja: バガボンド

description.en:
Growing up in the late 16th century Sengoku era Japan, Shinmen Takezou is shunned by the local villagers as a devil child due to his wild and violent nature. Running away from home with a fellow boy at age 17, Takezo joins the Toyotomi army to fight the Tokugawa clan at the Battle of Sekigahara. However, the Tokugawa win a crushing victory, leading to nearly three hundred years of Shogunate rule. Takezo and his friend manage to survive the battle and afterwards swear to do great things with their lives. However, after their paths separate, Takezo becomes a wanted criminal and must change his name and his nature in order to escape an ignoble death.  
  
**Awards:**
- Won the 24th Kodansha Manga Award in the general category in 2000.
- Won the Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2002 
**Note:** was nominated for the 2003 Eisner Award in the Best Writer/Artist category.
description.es:
Creciendo en el Japón de la era Sengoku de finales del siglo XVI, Shinmen Takezou es rechazado por los aldeanos locales como un niño demonio debido a su naturaleza salvaje y violenta. A los 17 años, Takezou se escapa de casa con un compañero y se une al ejército Toyotomi para luchar contra el clan Tokugawa en la batalla de Sekigahara. Sin embargo, los Tokugawa obtienen una aplastante victoria, lo que da lugar a casi trescientos años de gobierno del Shogunato. Takezou y su amigo consiguen sobrevivir a la batalla y después juran hacer grandes cosas con sus vidas. Sin embargo, cuando sus caminos se separan, Takezou se convierte en un criminal buscado y debe cambiar su nombre y su naturaleza para escapar de una muerte innoble.  
  
**Premios:**
    - Ganó el 24º Premio Kodansha de Manga en la categoría general en 2000.
    - Ganó el Premio Cultural Tezuka Osamu en 2002
    **Nota:** fue nominado al Premio Eisner 2003 en la categoría de Mejor Escritor/Artista.

altTitles.ja: ぷにるはかわいいスライム

description.en: The slime he created transformed into a girl!? Kotarou, a young boy, is constantly pushed around by Puniru's freewheeling behavior. It's a fun and exciting daily life!
description.ja: コロコロ史上初、異色のラブコメまんが！！ 自分の作ったスライムが女の子に変身!?　ぷにるの自由気ままな言動に少年・コタローは振り回されっぱなし。毎日愉快なドキドキ生活だ!!

altTitles.ja: 大ダーク

description.en:
A legend spreading among the whole universe says whoever collects Zaha Sanko's bones will have any kind of wish granted. 
Thus, he and his skeletal buddy Avakian will use their dark powers to fend off any murder attempts while they search through 
space for whoever put this curse on Sanko’s bones: killing them might end the madness.
description.ru: С самого детства Заха Санко боролся за свою жизнь. Как гласят легенды, если вы завладеете костями Захи Санко, вам исполнится любое желание. Вместе со своим другом Авакяном и силой тьмы Заха путешествует по космосу, чтобы найти человека, который проклял его кости и положил конец их жизни.
